delphin_6_automation.delphin_setup package¶

Submodules¶

delphin_6_automation.delphin_setup.create_delphin_file module¶

delphin_6_automation.delphin_setup.delphin_permutations.change_layer_material(delphin_dict: dict, original_material: str, new_material: dict) → dict¶

Changes the material of a layer.

Parameters:
  • delphin_dict (dict) – Delphin dict to change.
  • original_material (str) – Name of material that should be changed.
  • new_material (dict) – New material given as a dict. Dict should have the following keys: @name, @color, @hatchCode and #test.
Returns:

Modified Delphin dict
Return type:

dict
delphin_6_automation.delphin_setup.delphin_permutations.change_layer_width(delphin_dict: dict, original_material: str, new_width: float) → dict¶

Changes the width of a single layer, while keeping number of elements in the project.

Parameters:
  • delphin_dict (dict) – Delphin dict to change.
  • original_material (str) – Name of material to change the width of.
  • new_width (float) – New width in m
Returns:

Modified Delphin dict
Return type:

dict
delphin_6_automation.delphin_setup.delphin_permutations.change_weather(delphin_dict: dict, original_weather: str, new_weather: str) → dict¶

Changes the weather file of a weather instance. Can therefore only be used on climate conditions that is loaded from a file.

Parameters:
  • delphin_dict (dict) – Delphin dict to change.
  • original_weather (str) – Name of the original weather
  • new_weather (str) – New weather file path
Returns:

Modified Delphin dict
Return type:

dict
delphin_6_automation.delphin_setup.delphin_permutations.convert_discretization_to_list(delphin_dict: dict) → list¶

Get the discretized elements of a project.

Parameters:delphin_dict (dict) – Delphin dict to look in.
Returns:A list with the discretizated values.
Return type:list
delphin_6_automation.delphin_setup.delphin_permutations.discrete_layer(width: float, steps: int) → list¶

Discretization of width in a given number of steps.

Parameters:
  • width (float) – Width in m
  • steps (int) – Number of steps or discretizations to make.
Returns:

A list with the discretizated values.
Return type:

list
delphin_6_automation.delphin_setup.delphin_permutations.get_layers(delphin_dict: dict) → dict¶

Get the layers of a Delphin dict.

Parameters:delphin_dict (dict) – Delphin dict to get layers from.
Returns:Dict of dicts. Each nested dict has the keys: material, x_width, x_index
Return type:dict
delphin_6_automation.delphin_setup.delphin_permutations.sub_division(width: float, minimum_division: float, stretch_factor: float) → list¶

Creates a subdivision of the material to be used for the discretization.

Parameters:
  • width (float) – Width of the material to be subdivided
  • minimum_division (float) – Width of the smallest division
  • stretch_factor (float) – Increase in subdivisions
Returns:

List containing width of subdivisions
Return type:

list
